snippet: Estate taxes have become caught up in the competing proposals in the fiscal debate, but it is still virtually impossible to know the terms of any potential compromise.
abstract: Estate taxes have become caught up in the competing proposals in the fiscal debate, but it is still virtually impossible to know the terms of any potential compromise.
lead_paragraph: Like so many other provisions of the tax code, estate taxes are caught up in the tangle of competing proposals in the rush to a year-end resolution of the nation’s fiscal crisis.

headline.main: Estate Tax Gets Lost in the Fiscal Shuffle
